verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] [V: has] [ARG1: a relatively quiet day scheduled in Singapore] [ARGM-TMP: Monday] , [ARGM-TMP: following the weekend ’s fractious G7 gathering in Canada and ahead of Tuesday ’s historic summit with Kim Jong Un] .

President Trump has [ARG1: a relatively quiet day] [V: scheduled] [ARGM-LOC: in Singapore] Monday , following the weekend ’s fractious G7 gathering in Canada and ahead of Tuesday ’s historic summit with Kim Jong Un .

President Trump has a relatively quiet day scheduled in Singapore Monday , [V: following] [ARG2: the weekend ’s fractious G7 gathering in Canada and ahead of Tuesday ’s historic summit with Kim Jong Un] .
